verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Panis Angelicus fit panis hominum
Dat panis coelicus figuris terninum
O res mirabilis Manducat Domininum
Pauper, pauper, servus et humilis

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Pauper, pauper, servus et humilis
Panis Angelicus fit panis hominum
Dat panis coelicus figuris terninum
O res mirabilis Manducat Domininum

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
Pauper, pauper, servus et humilis
Pauper, pauper, servus et humilis
